8. The pathologic staging is pT2b NO MX, which means the tumor invades the subserosa (pT2b) with no regional lymph node metastasis (pNO) and cannot be assessed for distant metastasis (pMX).

Based on the AJCC staging system, a tumor that invades the subserosa (pT2b) with no regional lymph node metastasis (pNO) corresponds to Stage II.
